## Discussion

This property is similar to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatchRequest].[doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatchRequest/recipientProperties] property but with some additions that Game Center may add. For example, if you add team rules to your rule set, use the `gc` and `team` keys to get the name of the player’s team, similar to [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatch/properties].

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/matchmaking-rules].

# playerProperties

**Instance Property**

The properties for other players that matchmaking rules uses to find players, with some additions.

## Declaration

```swift
var playerProperties: [GKPlayer : [String : Any]]? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is similar to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatchRequest].[doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatchRequest/recipientProperties] property but with some additions that Game Center may add. For example, if you add team rules to your rule set, use the `gc` and `team` keys to get the name of the player’s team, similar to [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKMatch/properties].

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/matchmaking-rules].

## Getting matchmaking properties

- **properties**: The local player’s properties that matchmaking rules used to find the players with some additions.
